attributes.action: No bail out for any airline. This crisis can permanently  reduce CO2 emissions.
attributes.additional_details: Air travel produces large sums of CO2 that damage the world environment. To meet CO2 targets air travel must reduce. The Covid 19 crisis is an opportunity for a change to which businesses exist, and also our habits.
attributes.background: The government should provide no funding to bail out airlines, but should provide funding for workers of airlines to avoid poverty.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302992

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
